EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: You are Requested to Review the Application #{!ApplicationReview__c.ApplicationId__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification email that the Application # {!ApplicationReview__c.ApplicationId__c}has to be reviewed.
This email is to notify you to review the assigned Application {!ApplicationReview__c.ApplicationId__c} for Announcement {!Review__c.FundingOpportunityTitle__c}.
Please login to EGMS Systems and go to Pending Tasks list to locate the Application.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
